definition: to check the accounts/to take stock

sentences.english: You were in balance last night when you closed?
sentences.chinese: 昨夜结束业务时，您的帐目是平衡的吧？

sentences.english: Interest arising on the overall cash balance attributable to individual donors will be recorded in the account.
sentences.chinese: 将在帐目中记录各捐助方现金总结余产生的利息。

sentences.english: Backham Earns 47000 Pounds a Day Accounts Reveal.
sentences.chinese: 帐目显示贝克汉姆日入47000英磅。

sentences.english: Is this not of more consequence than a fat red-faced gentleman's sums?
sentences.chinese: 这难道不比那个大胖子红脸先生的帐目更重要？

sentences.english: April 30 he had an appointment with Bosinney to go over the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 四月三十日那一天，他跟波辛尼约好看一下帐目。

sentences.english: The new company has duly taken over all accounts outstanding and will take all responsibility for the settlement of accounts。
sentences.chinese: 新的公司已接管了一切未了帐目，并将负责清算。

sentences.english: For instance, how you manage invoicing and accounting is part of your foundation.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，怎样管理发票和帐目就是根基的一部分。

sentences.english: History is replete with accounts of expert tacticians choosing the proper moment to impact the battle.
sentences.chinese: 历史充满帐目战专家选择适当时机，影响战斗。

sentences.english: The book-keeper manipulated the company's accounts to conceal his theft.
sentences.chinese: 那会计窜改公司帐目以掩饰他的盗窃行为。

sentences.english: Check account with the financial department and control the arrearage .
sentences.chinese: 与财务部门帐目核对及应收欠款的控制。

sentences.english: I shall remain and look over the accounts with Danglars.
sentences.chinese: 我还得留下来和腾格拉尔核对一下帐目。

sentences.english: That klutz lost several account receipts, so the accountants were upset.
sentences.chinese: 那个傻瓜掉了几张帐目收据，因此会计很不高兴。

sentences.english: When the inspection group declared that the accounts checked, the staff all cheered.
sentences.chinese: 当检查组宣布帐目核对无误时，职工们都欢呼了起来。

sentences.english: If that account comes up empty, begin making choices that invest in a joy-filled life.
sentences.chinese: 如果帐目是空的，那就选择投资一个充满快乐的人生。

sentences.english: Draw up a simple accounting chart for your expenses and revenues.
sentences.chinese: 为你的开支和收入画一个简单的帐目表。

sentences.english: Looks after wages account, shores leaves and liaises with crew's family.
sentences.chinese: 负责船员的薪酬帐目及休假事宜，并与船员家属联络。

definition: to audit accounts/to inspect accounting books
to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]
an accounts office (in former times)/an accountant/a cashier
to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
